stories.title: How global media covered Russia's invasion of Ukraine

stories.text:
After all brouhaha around GDPR over the past month or so, I've decided to port my sideproject from Azure, Netlify and DigitalOcean to a local provider.

I've found one that checks all the boxes, except they don't offer any managed databases. Is it a fools errand to host my own Postgres database on a VPS? I've actually considered running everything off of (multliple instances of) SQLite so that I don't have to manage Postgres.
stories.title: Ask HN: Tips on hosting your own Postgres instance

stories.text:
Hello HN readers, We just launched Supermeme, an original AI meme generator that is very easy to use. You can pick a theme (Startup, Programming, etc) and pick a meme template and generate original memes in seconds using GPT-3 and other NLP techniques.

It is free to get started and try out. Would love to get feedback and iterate :)

https://supermeme.ai/

Regards, Ramsri
stories.title: Show HN: Generate original memes with AI (GPT-3)
